日本列島沖/呉Q基地: Off the coast of Japan / Kure Q-Base
敵前線環礁泊地の機動部隊\nを殲滅するため作戦を実施\nする！Q基地で改良特四式: Conduct an operation to destroy the task force at the enemy's front-line atoll berths! Receive Special Type 4 Amphibious Tanks at Q-Base!
九州南方沖/マリアナ諸島方面: Off the south of Kyushu / Mariana Islands
「竜巻作戦」を発動する！\nウルシー環礁まで前進した\n敵機動部隊の航空母艦を本: Launch "Operation Tatsumaki"! This operation will inflict a hard blow on the aircraft carriers of the enemy task force that have advanced to Ulithi Atoll! Sortie!
マリアナ諸島/ウルシー環礁沖: Off the Mariana Islands / Ulithi Atoll
泊地突入！龍巻作戦:
Break into the Anchorage!
Operation Tatsumaki
「竜巻作戦」を発展させた\n「龍巻作戦」で、今度こそ\n環礁泊地の敵空母群を殲滅: In the expanded Operation Tatsumaki, this time, we will destroy the enemy carrier group in the atoll! Carve victory over the dawn's atoll!
竜巻作戦によって前線を大\nきく押し戻した。今こそ、\n総力決戦「新Z作戦改」で: Operation Tatsumaki has pushed the frontline back significantly. Now is the time to destroy the enemy in the all-out decisive battle "New Operation Z Kai"! Sortie in full force!
瀬戸内海航行中……まもなく呉Q基地沖です。:
Sailing in the Seto Inland Sea...
... Will be soon off Kure Q-Base.
北方警備、第五艦隊！大湊より出撃す！:
Northern Patrol, Fifth Fleet!
Sortie from Ominato!
Q基地沖に到着しました。作戦準備機材を揚陸、\n「特四式内火艇」部隊を強化を実地:
We have reached the Q-Base. Reinforcement
of 'Special Type 4 Amphibious Tank'
     units will be carried out!
敵水上艦隊の牽制を行う！前進せよ！:
Keep the enemy surface fleet in check!
Move forward!
機動部隊、出撃！出撃中の敵空母を撃破せよ！\n対潜警戒も厳とせよ！:
Task force, sortie!
 Destroy incoming enemy aircraft carriers!
     Take strict anti-submarine measures!
「龍巻作戦」部隊、出撃！敵環礁泊地に突入せよ！:
'Operation Tatsumaki' units, sortie!
Storm the enemy atoll anchorage!
ウェーキ島への補給輸送作戦を実施するッ！\n敵勢力圏内だ…対空対水上対潜警戒を厳:
Conduct supply and transport operations to
Wake Island! We're in enemy territory...
     maintain strict all-around vigilance!
